banner.title: Are You Ready for a Journey Filled with Health and Miracles?
banner.description: With our expert doctors and modern hospital, we offer you not just a treatment, but an experience.

section1.title: A BETTER LIFE IS POSSIBLE WITH US
section1.sub-title: As Health and Wonders, we act with the responsibility of being with you at the most important turning points of your life.
section1.description: In your health journey, we aim to keep your comfort and safety at the highest level with a service understanding that overcomes language barriers and is accessible 24/7. Take a step with us, let's walk to a healthier life together.

callToAction.title: Experience the Comfort of Your Home and the Warmth of Your Family with Us.
callToAction.description: Your comfort and satisfaction during the recovery process are our top priority. Therefore, our surgeon's dynamic and energetic team provides service in YOUR NATIVE LANGUAGE during your hospital stay. With this special service that supports you at every step before, during, and after the surgery, feeling safe and comfortable is guaranteed. Are you ready to start your journey in peace? Contact Health and Wonders today and let us provide you with the care and support you deserve.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We are by your side with innovative surgical solutions for a healthy weight loss journey, an aesthetic beauty touch, and balanced body contours.

service_1.title: Weight Loss Surgery
service_1.description: Rediscover yourself with customized weight loss surgeries for a healthy life.

service_2.title: Cosmetic Surgery
service_2.description: Achieve a natural and elegant appearance with cosmetic solutions that highlight your beauty.

service_3.title: Breast Surgery
service_3.description: Shape your body contours in a balanced and aesthetic way with aesthetic and functional breast surgeries.

certificates.title: Our Certificates
certificates.description: Our certificates represent our high standards in health services and our commitment to continuous improvement, demonstrating our determination to provide the best service to our valued patients.

appointmentForm.title: Our Global Vision: Innovation and Care in Health Tourism
appointmentForm.description: We aim to make a difference with our innovative, meticulous approach in health tourism as part of our goal to become a global brand. We provide psychological and physical support to our patients at the decision stage and during the treatment process.
appointmentForm.grid_item4: Face-to-face Interactive Communication and Meeting with Surgeon
appointmentForm.grid_item5: Free Provision of the First Medication Kit
appointmentForm.form-subtitle: Contact us for an appointment. Our doctors will assist you with your general and medical questions.
appointmentForm.form-privacy2: I have read the privacy policy and terms regarding the protection of personal and health information.

map.title: Health Tourism in Kuşadası!
map.description: Step into a healthy life in the paradise of Kuşadası, where nature and history meet. Why Kuşadası? These lands, full of ancient healing knowledge, have witnessed centuries of medical evolution. Ephesus, as a symbol of health knowledge, shapes modern healing practices.
map.list-item1: Our company, with its modern medical infrastructure and expert medical staff, stands out in health tourism.
map.list-item2: In Kuşadası, enjoy integrated health services with the sea and sun, as well as thermal waters and natural healing resources.
map.list-item3: Kuşadası promises unforgettable moments with hassle-free travel, top-level health services, an expert team, and a rich cultural texture.

banner.title: Health & Wonders, Innovative Services in Health.
banner.description: By offering our years of accumulated experience directly to our patients, we aim to provide our own innovative, sincere, and professional service, considering the potential and deficiencies in this field.

section1.title: Why Health And Wonders?
section1.description: Turning our brand into a global brand is our biggest goal. Our mission is to provide all kinds of psychological and physical support to our patients at the stage they make this decision and afterwards. We aim to differentiate ourselves with a more innovative and meticulous approach in health tourism.

section2.title: Privileges We Offer to Our Patients
section2.description: We provide special NATIVE career (hospital companion) service for the comfort and satisfaction of our patients during their recovery process. We eliminate communication problems and offer fast treatment options. In addition, we support with a free 'aftercare' service for one year after surgery. We offer a reliable and innovative option in the Aegean region.

section3.title: As Health&Wonders, We Offer a Wide Range of Special Treatment Methods to Meet the Health Needs of Your Family Members!
section3.description: With the innovative options offered by modern medicine, we apply each treatment specifically to the individual's needs, from Gastric Sleeve Surgery to Tummy Tuck.

item1.title: Special Companion Support
item1.description: Feel safe at every moment with our special companion service during your hospital stay.

item2.title: Direct Access to Fast Treatment
item2.description: Achieve your health in the shortest time with a fast and effective treatment process without a waiting list.

item3.title: 24/7 Aftercare Possibility
item3.description: With our aftercare service, which will be with you for a year after the operation, receive uninterrupted support during your recovery process.

item4.title: Innovative Health Solutions
item4.description: Regain your health with our innovative health services in the Aegean and step into a happy life.

section4.title: Special Privileges in Your Health Journey
section4.description: We elevate your treatment process not only to be effective but also comfortable and special with our services, enhancing your recovery to the next level.

banner.title: Comprehensive Treatment Options
banner.description: As Health and Wonders, we offer various health services suitable for your needs. Our goal is to provide you with the most effective treatment methods.

card1.title: Gastric Sleeve Surgery
card1.description: Gastric Sleeve Surgery allows you to permanently lose excess weight. This operation helps you feel fuller quicker by reducing the size of your stomach.
card1.item3: Reduced risk of chronic diseases like diabetes

card2.title: Gastric Balloon
card2.description: The Gastric Balloon is an ideal solution for those who cannot lose weight through diet and exercise alone. This balloon placed in the stomach helps you eat less.

card3.title: Stomach Botox
card3.description: Stomach Botox helps you lose weight by controlling your appetite. It reduces the contractions of the stomach, making you feel fuller for longer.

card4.title: Tummy Tuck
card4.description: A Tummy Tuck tightens sagging or loose abdominal skin, giving a firmer appearance. It provides aesthetic and functional improvement.
card4.item2: A flatter and firmer abdominal appearance

card5.title: Breast Lift
card5.description: A Breast Lift reshapes your sagging breasts, giving a younger and more aesthetic appearance.
card5.item1: Breasts obtain a younger and aesthetic look
card5.item3: Breasts gain a fuller and firmer appearance
